actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to designate 2.2 miles of the proposed Crosstown Freeway in Stockton, California, as part of the Interstate Highway System.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to designate the uncompleted 2.2 mile portion of the Crosstown Expressway connecting I-5 and State 99 in Stockton, California, as part of the Interstate Highway System.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to designate 2.2 miles of the proposed Crosstown Freeway in Stockton, California, as part of the Interstate Highway System.
